ygData.subject: Re: Made My First Aqua Lung last night =)
ygData.msgSnippet: You still consume oxygen, so you need to refill those oxygen tubes now and then... It would make sense if you somehow could recharge these things though... few
ygData.messageBody:
You still consume oxygen, so you need to refill those oxygen tubes now and
then...
It would make sense if you somehow could recharge these things though... few ppl
would buy aqua lungs for any reasonably profit bringing price if they last only
1 charge. Sounds pretty ridiculous to me... oh well...

Miffe Treetall, still making cams to raise skill

Btw, what is your tinkering skill, FizzWizz?


From: Monica Bradlee <mbradlee@...>

well just a few real life facts a rebreather is a device that recycles your own
air you breath and feeds it back to you after the filter takes out some of the
carbon dioxide. So if Verant follows the real thing it should have unlimited
charges.
